# Data_Augmentation

A complete Python library for advanced image data augmentation — including geometric, color, noise, and occlusion-based transformations.

### Features
✅ Flip, Rotate, Scale, Shear, Crop, Perspective, Elastic Deformation  
✅ Brightness, Contrast, Hue, Gamma, Solarize, Posterize  
✅ Gaussian, Speckle, Motion, Defocus, Salt & Pepper Noise  
✅ Cutout, Hide-and-Seek, GridMask, Mixup, CutMix, FMix  

### Installation
```bash
pip install -e .
